domain.name: Brand Vertical
domain.description: Top level entities that describe a Brands industry

domain.name: Brand Category
domain.description: Categories within Brand Verticals that narrow down the scope of Brands

text: But, sporting events, concerts, Disney are all closed for a reason. COVID-19 is just like the flu. Realistically we will all eventually get this, just like we have all had the flu before. But this is a new virus that needs to be slowed down for our medical field to catch up.
